properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_STATUS_CD != 1
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ITEM_LIST WHERE ITEM_STATUS_CD != 1 ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_STATUS_CD != 1 AND CATEGORY_CD = ?
